title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: Deepdale Golf Club is a private golf club in Manhasset, New York, just east of New York City on Long Island.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The club was founded by William K. Vanderbilt II in 1924, using part of his Deepdale summer estate at Lake Success.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: Charles B. Macdonald designed the course, assisted by Seth Raynor.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The Deepdale Golf Club was incorporated on 26 October 1924 as a private club with a strictly limited membership.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: Noted members in the past included the Duke of Windsor and President Dwight D. Eisenhower.In the 1950s suburbs began to be built in the region, and in 1954 the Long Island Expressway was built, cutting through the north end of the course.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The club bought the nearby Joseph Peter Grace, Sr. estate and had a new course designed by Dick Wilson.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The Grace mansion was used as the clubhouse.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The prestigious club was the location of the 1955 Deepdale Calcutta handicapping scandal.
pos: DT JJ NN VBD DT NN IN DT CD NNP NNP VBG NN .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: A Calcutta auction, named after the Royal Calcutta Turf Club, is a form of betting in which the competitors in  tournament are auctioned off to bidders in a pool.
pos: DT NNP NN , VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBZ DT NN IN NN IN WDT DT NNS IN NN VBP VBN IN TO NNS IN DT NN .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The "owners" of the winning team split their portion of the pool with the players.
pos: DT `` NNS '' IN DT VBG NN VBD PRP$ NN IN DT NN IN DT NNS .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: Calcuttas were often rigged, with golfers faking their handicaps or accepting bribes to lose.
pos: NNS VBD RB VBN , IN NNS VBG PRP$ NNS CC VBG NNS TO VB .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: In 1955 two three-handicap golfers entered an amateur tournament at Deepdale.
pos: IN CD CD JJ NNS VBD DT JJ NN IN NNP .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: They gave their handicaps as 17 and 18, scored a net 58-57 and won by five strokes.
pos: PRP VBD PRP$ NNS IN CD CC CD , VBD DT JJ JJ CC VBN IN CD NNS .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: They and the syndicate that backed them each won $16,000 from a $45,000 pool.
pos: PRP CC DT NN WDT VBD PRP DT VBD $ CD IN DT $ CD NN .

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: The scandal emerged after one of the players admitted what he had done in a letter to the President of the club, and the story reached the newspapers.

title: Deepdale Golf Club
text: As of 2006 the course was rated 36 in the list of America's "100 Most Prestigious Golf Clubs" published by Golf Connoisseur magazine.In March 2006 it was reported that the village of North Hills, an extremely wealthy community, was looking into using eminent domain laws to condemn the club and convert it to a semi-public course for use by local residents.
